name: Cultist Meditation
body:
### Welcome to Cultist Meditation.
Venture down into the [dungeon] to fulfill the [ritual] of your dreams with [guidance] of the meditating cultists (twitch crowd)!

### Global Game Jam 2016 (Finnish GJ, Oulu)
Crafted in one hectic 48h marathon!

### Authors and Contributors
@Zaelot
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
